Игра в своём роде уникальна. Идея и проработка хороша. Единственный и большой минус это огромное количество багов и недоработок. Проблемы с поиском адекватного противника(ов) (обещают исправить в патче). Ставлю + в надежде что в ближайшее время это исправят. А так 10 испачканных штанов из 10.

O Melhor Jodo Multiplayer de "Terror"!
O jogo tem várias mecânicas diferentes, personagens únicos, mapas variados. O jogo só repetitivo por oferecer apenas um modo de gameplay: Quatro survivors contra um assassino, o objetivo é sempre o mesmo para os survivors basta ligar 5 geradores, abrir os portões e vazar, para o killer basta derrubar os survivors, gancha-los e esperar a entidade os consumir.
O jogo fica um pouco chato, quando por exemplo os killer camperam o survivor ganchado, sem deixar que os outros o salvem. Mas o jogo é super divertido jogo a um tempo e vejo que cada vez mais os jogadores inovam sua jogabilidade durante uma partida, sinceramente o jogo só se torna legal quando todos os jogadores de uma partida são bons ou jogam a bastante tempo.
好玩！！！

Jogo legal, divertido. Bugs são normais e estao em andamento, mas o restante ta sussa, a parte do host ser um player, realmente em alguns casos é complicado pela internet, mas isso nao tira o merito e a proposta do jogo.
noice

改回好评

Español:

A favor:
+ El precio.
+ La idea del juego.
+ Los asesinos que se pueden usar.

En contra:
- Tardaron 3 años en poner servidores dedicados.
- Cada vez que hay una actualización se rompe algo del juego.
- Esta lleno de bugs.
- La traducción era correcta anteriormente, pero se les dio por cambiarla y ahora es un desastre sin sentido.
- El matchmaking esta roto.
- El Hitbox de Freddy, La Cerda y La Enfermera son asquerosamente falsos.
- El Hitbox de los destrales de La Cazadora atraviesan objetos.
- Los jugadores de latinoamerica están enfermos mentalmente.
- Tardaron 3 años en poner penalización para la gente que quitea.
- Hay gran cantidad de usuarios con lag switch.
- El juego esta diseñado para que los jugadores mas experimentados lo abandonen y darle todo regalado a los nuevos usuarios.
- Desbalanceado completamente.

English:

Positive:
+ The price.
+ The idea of the game.
+ The killers that can be used.

Negative:
- It took 3 years to put dedicated servers.
- Every time there is an update something of the game is broken.
- It is full of bugs.
- The translation was correct before, but they were given to change it and now it is a disaster without sense.
- The pairing is broken.
- Freddy's Hitbox, the pig and the Nursedw are disgustingly false.
- The Huntress hatches's through objects.
- The Latin American players are mentally ill.
- It took 3 years to put penalties when a user quits from the game.
- There are many users with lag switch.
- The game is designed for more experienced players to abandon it and welcome all new users.
- Unbalanced completely.
Игра класс, рекомендую)
oyunu açınca kendıni aşşa alıyor. bozuk yapmışlar.

[h1]Funny game with boring mechanics and dumb/smart developer.[/h1]

Funny if played with no expectation with friends.
Boring if played "competitive".

[b]I played at high rank in both roles.[/b]

About the dev:
A bug took more than 2 weeks to be fixed, even if it was breaking the game, because the dev were on holiday/working on something else. Actually it seems the game is an "alpha test" of the console version.

About the mechanics:
The ranking system is a joke. People cry because "the killer is a camper", "the survivors sabotaged every hook".
BUT WHY DO THEY CARE?! You win when you make points, not when you save or kill people.

[b]How do you make easy points?[/b]

As survivors you have 2 strategies: 
[olist]
[*]Wait until someone is chased to do the generators and then RUN. You have 25% chance to be the first... So even if you die in one game, you should be able to "win" the other 3. The point is: MAKE POINTS, DO GENERATORS, don't waste time running around.
[*]Level up fast to get right perks and make the killer cry.
[/olist]

[b]If you want to climb up as a killer, MAKE POINTS![/b]
[olist]
[*]Don't try to kille everyone, you get more points stabbing the same guy over and over than hooking all of them 1 by 1. Play with your food! But "they escape" you say. Well, you will end with 20k points, so, who cares?!
[*]And of course: Level up fast to get the right perks and make the survivors cry.
[/olist]

Rank 1 strategies.

Are they funny? No.
Do they work? Yes.
What devs think about that? They are "ready" for the console release.

キラーメインでプレイした感想なので多少偏っているかもしれません。
ですが、決して誇張表現ではないことを前置きしておきます。

フック破壊などキラー側でやるとストレスになる要素が生存者側に多すぎる。
それに加え民度が低く生存者の煽りは日常茶飯事。
キラー側はポイントを稼ぎやすい反面、技術や熟練度に伴わないランクの上がり方をし、結果的に初心者、パーク足りないキラーvsティーチャブルパークガン積みサバイバー4人、みたいなマッチングが普通に起こってしまうのも残念。

ろくにパークもない熟練度で、フックすべて壊され、煽られているうちにこのゲームをやらなくなりました。

初心者の方にはある程度のメンタルの強さ、パークが整うまでの厳しい状況を辛抱強く我慢する忍耐力等、苦痛な要素も多いかもしれません。

ですが鬼ごっこゲームとしての観点ではとてもよくできていると思うので興味があれば試してみてください。

Eigentlich ein sehr kurzweiliges und gutes Spiel, aber beginn an nahezu unspielbar. Die Lobby funktioniert nur ca. jedes 20. mal ohne dass das Speil abstürzt...und wenn man dann mal endlich eine Lobby findet, sind meist nur 2 oder 3 Leute noch im Spiel anstat 4 (Überlebende). Auch ein Problem ist, dass der Killer den Server für die aktuelle Runde bereitstellt....hat dieser eine miese Internetverbindung laggt dies extrem bei den Überlebenden und macht das Spiel unspielbar. Sorry....trotz aller Euphorie und viel Gedult bin ich jetzt am Ende und habe keinerlei Lust mehr. Vorallem weil es den Entwicklern wichtiger ist monatelang alle Beschwerden zu ignorieren und lieber neuen, zu bezahlenden Content in das Speil zu bringen anstatt auf die Comunity zu hören und Fehler zu verbessern. Anfragen bei Behavior (den Entwicklern) diesabezüglich stossen auch auf taube Ohren! Im "wirklichen" Leben würde man ein Unternehmen mit solchen Praktiken verklagen (man stelle sich vor, man kauft ein Auto welches so fehlerhaft ist, dass es beispielsweise nur jeden 20. Tag anspringt). Ich kann derzeit nur jedem davon abraten auch nur einen Cent für DbD auszugeben. Wenn Behavior sich irgendwann einmal entschließt etwas zu ändern, werde ich gerne meine Meinung ändern....aktuell sind das Spiel und die verantwortlichen Personen für mich Geschichte!

UPD:Пофиксили, играть стало комфортнее. Приятно, что вводят новых бесплатных убийц и, вообще, развивают игру. Рекомендую!

UPD2: Опять скатились, иногда чтобы поиграть за выжевшего, необходимо много раз пытаться войти в лобби, и стало выкидывать с новой ошибкой "вы исключены из-за невозможности проверить античитом". Раньше такого не было. Разрабы опять скатились в получение денюжки за доп. конект вместо допиливания серверов. Не рекомендую.

This game is so broken. Very spoilt.

Before I begin anything, I would just like to say: I am still playing this game, despite my "negative" review. This is really just loads of crap that's wrong with it.

1) This is a very buggy game, but you can't expect it to be perfect - no game is - since this is not a "mainstream" game, as in, it's available for purchase in stores, for consoles, etc.

2) It seems to be unbalanced as fudge (yes, fudge), with the paid killers. For example, "The Shape" (aka Micheal Myers), is very fucking overpowered. With no addons, he can progress into tier 3 when he can down survivors INSTANTLY for a whole minute. Sure, it takes a while, but he can keep it just so that he's a tiny bit away from tier 3, go into a group of survivors, and fu-- them all up. 

Obviously, there are ways you can avoid him, such as staying away from him, setting up a tent in the basement for a while, etc. Skilled survivors do have a fair advantage against him, but for newer players, they stand absoultely no fuDGing chance against him. 

3) The game seems to be a bit "Pay 2 Win". "The Shape" is DLC, along with the Hag and Doctor, which I cover in my next point.

4) The Hag can hook a survivor, place a trap, walk away a little outside the heartbeat radius, camp, then wait for the trap to be activated and teleport to it, taking down at least the hooked survivor again, if not the survivor that attempted the un-hook, too.

5) The doctor I have no real complaints about. But, the thing is, he can do what the hag does, but with his "treatment" mode (when in treatment, survivors gain instanity up to tier 3. When the survivor goes up 1 tier, they scream, revealing their position to the killer. In Tier 3 madness, survivors regularly scream, until they "snap out of it"). The Doctor can camp around the hooked survivor with treatment, then take down a survivor trying to save the hooked one. 

I guess, though, this logic can be applied to most killers, but it seems to be more "dominant" in these killers.

6) This is not so much the Developer's fault, but at first, the game was absolutely awesome. Survivors helped eachother, etc. It's only recently that survivors have started to troll, by body blocking the survivor when they are being chased, resulting in the survivor being downed + hooked, or injured. 

7) It seems that every new update that was supposed to "fix" the game only breaks it a little more. I feel bad, though, since the devs do put time into updates, and I find that they look like they're trying their best.

8) Sometimes, my game's graphics will break up, resulting in pixel-like graphics. This also drops my FPS to 10-15 and usually happens when I'm being chased, which provides a huge advantage to the killer (note: my FPS is usually a solid 60).

Anyway, I still play the game, but the things I mentioned takes away from the experience. It really sucks, because this is a good game, with good devs and good ideas, and good support. 

Thanks for reading my review. I hope this doesn't sway you from buying the game, though. I encourage you to buy it, it's honestly a great game! :)
